hideAreaUnderButton: Rent bikes or guides
textContent: With each group we will spend time to talk about the trails, but to discover more about the area, the habits, the history or the mining industry of Rosia Montana we recommend to book guided tours. The bookings for bikes, guided tours by bike or walk, or for a meeting with the locals can be made from the accommodation page and on arrival you will meet our guide and configure the trails you will like to make.
